content.p: Being Human Festival logo Each November, Being Human Festival presents hundreds of free events across the UK and beyond. Festival events aim to celebrate and demonstrate the ways in which the humanities inspire and enrich our everyday lives, help us to understand ourselves, our relationships with others, and the challenges we face in a changing world. Researcher from the University of Nottingham will be hosting a number of free workshops at Nottingham Central Library from the 7 - 14 November, as part of this nationwide celebration of the humanities. Find out more and get involved via the Ode to Notts event programme page! University Park Nottingham NG7 2RD t: +44 (0) 115 951 5151 e: theinstitute@nottingham.ac.uk
